TopicTitle: Live Stream: The Kerbin Mission, Kerbin Academy...and other stuff !

Articles.Content:
Hi,

Well after a few hours I finally got 2 ships docked...now I transfer fuel and setoff for Mun...next is to pick up Neilbritt to organize a landing...needless to say we picked a spot that is ending up in the dark for 6 days; I may have him pick another that way we will have 2 spots 6 days apart...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

Taxi service is now in session...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

I found out that all Kerbin escape trajectories are affected by Serious so I found a way to recompile the planetfactory.dll to exclude Serious and Joker !!! You will have to see the Planet Factory thread for details...

I will be restarting a new missions setup, keeping my Science (!) and continuing on in a similar state - watch as I setup my asteroids for my new missions setup harr harr !!!

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Archives dont work and you have to save the Science tree in a seperate folder before missions exit...no biggy but worth the hastle to get these extra planets !!!

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

With the Planet Factory finally fixed with no Serious Sun in sight we can finally continue with the missions...today we see how far we get to get a Kerbalnaut on Mun !

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Yes there are a few asteroids causing havoc with Kerbin it seems - we are tracking some 100 of them with our new facilities...

We are also working on sending up new TAC Life support systems...hop on over and see the ventures...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

( that is Commander Zeta for thems in the not knowing department...including himself at times... )

Howdi,

I am restarting KSP - Yep - 23.5 career mode - I didnt get too far anyways but I miss it. I am trying out 64bit version and I hope to stream again soon ...

Zeta

Hello,

I hope to have my stream up altho the first hour will no doubt be boring; I am almost done setting up my Career Tree for Live Missions ! I should be ready for Real Kerbin Missions hopefully tonite; I may have to tweak some mods it seems as tho I am having some conflicts...wish me luck !

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

The Kerbin Missions are about to begin ! I will be streamin all morning ! These ere a real missions restart - if it's gone; it;s gone...to boldly go ...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

It has begun...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Hello,

It continues ... this mornin for a couple hours ...

http://www.twitch.tv/cdr_zeta

Cdr Zeta

Greetings,

Stream is active tonite ... The Kerbin Missions In Progress ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Stream is active tonite ... The Kerbin Missions In Progress ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Stream active all day ...

Cmdr Zeta
Stream is up ...

Hello,

Stream will be up momentarily ... workin on space station possibilities ... waiting for Kerbalnauts to reach Mun and Yukon...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Streaming all day and nite today ... Stream location in SIG !

Space Station and other odds and ends ...

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Stream is up for an hour or so ...drillin for ore, substrate, and ...?!

Cmdr Zeta

Hello,

Stream will be up - hourly game restarts due to memory...

Tonite - learnin mining ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Setting up for 2 1 hour streams tonite ...

Satellite maintenance and headed for Mun and Minmus maybe ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Setting up for a few 1 hour streams ...

Satellite maintenance and docking; headed for Mun and Minmus maybe ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Cmdr Zeta

Greetings,

Setting up for a few 1 hour streams ...

Satellite maintenance and docking; headed for Mun and Minmus eventually ... still ...

Cmdr Zeta

Greets !

Streamin all day an nite off and on !

Cdr Zeta

Due to a increase in target velocity 'make1b' on twitch told me of the null exception and -force-opengl fix on the start icon - I am having to update my graphics driver and trying to get ogl to work.

If it does - this is gonna gain me a whole whopping GIG of game memory for all the mods I got - wow !

Nice catch 'make1b' !

Cmdr Zeta

Greets !

Streamin tonite ..........

Cdr Zeta
